content.description:
Scientists studied the marsupial population in South America to determine species relatedness. The hypothetical relationships are presented in Figure 1.

Figure 1. Â Simplified cladogram of marsupial species in South America
content.question: Based on the cladogram in Figure 1, which of the following marsupials is most distantly related to the woolly opossum?

skill.text: 2.A: Describe characteristics of visual representations of biological concepts and processes.
